summary: Vanilla textures, brought up to 1024x1024. Gives the water a slower, yet more rippled look.
descriptionHtml:
Vanilla textures, brought up to 1024x1024. Gives the water a slower, yet more rippled look.

This is my first published mod/texture/improvement, etc. It was done quickly. I will be working on all of the water, but I did not have a lot of time as of now.

Please endorse and by all means, criticize! I can take it! I\'m new to this so if you know what exactly is causing a problem, let me know! Thanks! :D
author: iTimmeh
